## Description {#details}

Represents G&#95;BUILD&#95;VECTOR, G&#95;CONCAT&#95;VECTORS or G&#95;MERGE&#95;VALUES.

All these have the common property of generating a single value from multiple sources.

Definition at line 264 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/genericmachineinstrs-h">GenericMachineInstrs.h</a>.
